src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho thakgolwa ha letsholo la OTM ka Moqebelo wa la 1 Mphalane 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Sishov’ingolovane: mmoho re aha moralo wa motheo wa dipalangwang ntlafatsang maphelo batho.”.
tgt_text: Ejensi leyi yi ta lawula swikumiwa swa vutshunguri, na ku antswisa vuhlayiseki na matirhiselo ya swikumiwa swa vutshunguri swa tikokulu.

src_text: Lenaneo la selemo la OTM ke leo ka lona ho hlokomediswang setjhaba ka bohlokwa ba dipalangwang jwalo ka karolo ya kgolo le ntshetsopele ya moruo.
Ho tla ba le diketsahalo tse fapafapaneng mefuteng yohle ya dipalangwang jwalo ka difofane, dikepe, dipalangwang tsa setjhaba ha mmoho le tsa mebila.
tgt_text: Ku sayiniwa ka ku tiyisisiwa ka ntwanano lowu swi ta anstwisa ku tiboha ka misava hinkwa na ka tikokulu ka Afrika-Dzonga eka ku tiyisa sisiteme yo lawula ya tikokulu hi mayelana na swikumiwa swa rona swa rihanyo..     Xiviko hi mayelana na  wa Matirhelo ya Nongoloko wa Swihlohloteri swa Xibalo wa Ndzavisiso na Nhluvukiso (R&D)– 2019/20 na 2020/.

src_text: Diketsahalo tsena di tla hlokomedisa ka tshireletso le polokeho dipalangweng.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi pasise ku ringanyetiwa ePalemente ka Nongoloko wa Swihlohloteri swa Xibalo wa R&D eka malembe mambirhi lama hundzeke (2019/20 na 2020/21).

src_text: Bankakarolo ba tla bontshana le ka diphephetso tse tobaneng le lekala la dipalangwang..     Mmuso ntse ikemiseditse ka taba ya ho ntlafatsa meralo ya motheo ya dipalangwang, mahaeng le ditoropong ka sepheo sa ho bebofatsa ho thothwa ha batho le thepa..     Kopano ya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) ya Lenaneo la ho Dudiswa ha Batho.
tgt_text: Leswi swi fambisana na xiyenge xa 11D (17) xa Nawu wa Xibalo xa Malinghena, wa 1962 (Nawu wa 58 wa 1962), lowu wu lavaka ku andlariwa ka swiviko leswi ePalemente.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarwa ha kopano ya UN-HABITAT Johannesburg ka la 16 le la 17 Mphalane.
tgt_text: Nongoloko wa swihlohloteri swa xibalo wu lava ku hlohlotela tikhamphani to ka ti nga ri ta mfumo ku vekisa eka R&D hi xikongomelo xo hlohlotela ku kula ka vuvekisi.
Wu pfumelela ku antswisiwa ka sayense na vutumbuluxi hi mayelana na ku kula ka ikhonomi, na ku kondletela vuphikizani.

src_text: Lefapha la ho Dudiswa ha Setjhaba ke lona le tla tsamaisa seboka sena sa matsatsi mabedi seo ho sona ho tla tla boradipolotiki, basebeletsi le boradipatlisiso lekaleng lena ho kenyeletsa ditho tsa bohlokwa tseo tla beng le Kemedi ya UN-HABITAT ho tswa Nairobi, Kenya.

Taba tla ba ka sehloohong mona tla ba ho nkuwa ha mehato mabapi le dibaka tsa baipehi le ba mekhukhung..     Sephetho sa dipuisano tsena tla ba ona mokotaba tla theha Moralo wa Matjhaba tla tliswa ho Kopano ya UN-HABITAT ho tla pasiswa ka     Ditshisinyo tsa Melao.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi enerisiwa hileswaku xiviko lexi xi komba leswaku tikhamphani tintshwa ti endlile swikombelo swa xihlohloteri xa xibalo.

src_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Moifo wa Naha Shebaneng le Tlhekefetso tsa Basadi le Dipolao tsa Bona (GBVF) wa.
tgt_text: Swi hlohlotela tikhamphani to tala ku fikelela xikimi lexi tanihi xiphemu xo kurisa vuvekisi bya vona na ku hlohlotela ku kula ka ikhonomi.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa 2021 wa Moifo wa Naha Shebaneng le GBVF bakeng sa ho sekasekwa.
tgt_text: Tikhamphani ta mune ta xiyimo xa le henhla leti ti fikeleleke xihlohloteri xa xibalo ti le ka ku phurosesiwa ka swa vurimi; antswiso wa swa vucelamigodi; tikhemikali; swixongisi; tisekitara to endla mirhi na ta xithekiniki xa xielekitironiki na ta Thekinoloji ya Vuxokoxoko leti Khabinete yi ti amukeleke tanihi tindhawu ta swirhangana eka Kungu ra ya Pholisi ya Matirhelo ya Tiindasitiri.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena tla le moralo wa molao tla thusa ho theha komiti ya molao tla shebana le taba ya GBVF boetse dumella ho thehwa ha Boto tla tla le maano le ho kenya tshebetsong ha Leano la Moralo wa Naha shebaneng le GBVF le neng le tjhaelwe monwana ke Kabinete ka Mphalane.
tgt_text: Xiviko hi vutalo xi nga fikeleriwa hi ku tirhisa webusayiti ya Ndzawulo ya Sayense na Vutumbuluxi eka: www.dst.gov.za.

src_text: Boto ena tla ba le kemedi ya persente tse 51 ho tswa setjhabeng le tse 49 ho tswa mmusong.
tgt_text: Foramu ya Nawu wa ku Kula na Swivandlanene ya Afrika (AGOA) –.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao se phatlaladitswe bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba..     Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Kwae le Disebediswa tsa ho Tsuba tsa Elektroniki wa.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi pasisile ku rhurheriwa ka Foramu ya AGOA hi.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Kwae le Disebediswa tsa ho Tsuba tsa Elektroniki wa 2018 Palamenteng oo ka ona ho ikemiseditsweng hore kene sebakeng sa Molao Laolang Kwae wa 1993 (Molao wa bo 83 wa 1993) jwalo ka ha ntlafaditswe..     Ka tshisinyo ena ho ikemiseditswe ho tiisa melawana ya dipetlele tsa mmuso hore ikamahanye le ya Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Bophelo bo Botle Laolang Kwae nngwe ya dintho tse bolelwang ke tshisinyo ena ke dibaka tseo ho sa tsubelweng ho tsona kantle le ka hara meaho; ho kwalwa ha ho rekiswa ha kwae metjhining ya ho rekisa, le hore kwae be le letshwao la tlhokomediso pakaneng ya yona..     Tshisinyo ena sekasikilwe ke bankakarolo bohle ho kenyeletsa indasteri ya kwae, mekgatlo ya setjhaba ha mmoho le mafapha amehang mmuso     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: AGOA yi pasisiwile hi United States of America (USA) hi 2000 ku nyika mfikelelo wa ntsakelo wa bindzu ro tiyimela eka matiko mo tala ya xifundza xa Afrika xa le dzongeni wa Sahara na makete wa le matikweni ya le USA.

src_text: Kopano Tlwaelehileng ya bo 77 ya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UNGA77).
tgt_text: Swirhumeriwa ematikweni mambe hi Afrika-Dzonga ehansi ka AGOA swi katsa mihandzu yo dyiwa, timanga, mimovha, michini yo tirha hi yoxe, ngwedi, nsimbhi, na swikumiwa swa khemikali.

src_text: Afrika Borwa nka karolo ho UNGA77 tswelang pele ntlokgolo ya Matjhaba Kopaneng mane New York City, USA ho tloha ka la 20 ho isa ho la 27 Loetse 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Nako ya bohlokwa: Tharollo ya diphetoho mathateng rarahaneng”.
tgt_text: Siku ra xiviri na ndhawu swa ha ta tivisiwa..     Samiti ya Vaholobye hi mayelana na Mixiyaxiyo ya Misava (GEO) – .

src_text: Kgahlamelo ya sewa sa Khorona (COVID-19) dinaheng tseo moruo le bodulo ba teng bo seng maemong bile kgolo ha bapiswa le ya dinaha tse setletseng mme dinaha tsena ha di tlameha ho tlohelwa di sale morao ha re tla tabeng ya kahobotjha le tsoseletso..     Pele ho Ngangisano ya Kopanong eo ya UN, Mongodi Moholo wa UN, Ntate António Guterres tla kopanya seboka se mabapi le “Diphetoho ho tsa Thuto” mme bitse le kopano ya bohlokwa ya Maano Ntshetsopele (di-SDG).
tgt_text: Khabinete yi pasise leswaku Afrika-Dzonga yi rhurhela Samiti ya Vaholobye ya GEO eKapa hi.

src_text: Dikopano tsena tsa di-SDG ho lebeletswe hore di tle le ditsela tsa ho potlakisa ho kengwa tshebebetsong ha maano..     Letsatsi la Botjhaba.
tgt_text: GEO huvo ya le xikarhi ka mifumo leyi tumbuluxiweke hi 2003 endzhaku ka Samiti ya Misava ya 2002 hi mayelana na Nhluvukiso wa Vuyisekamahlweni.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla fana ka puo ya bohlokwa moketeng wa ho keteka Letsatsi la Botjhaba la 2022 mane Union Buildings ka Moqebelo wa la 24 Loetse.
tgt_text: Yi tirha tanihi pulatifomo ya mavandlanyingi laha matiko hi ku tinyiketela ma hoxaka xandla hi mayelana na xikongomelokulu xa nhlanganelo xa ku aka tisisiteme ta GEO.

src_text: Lepetjo la mokete ona ke le reng: “Re Hopola Lefa la Solomon Linda re Thabela le Mmino wa Setso sa Afrika Borwa.”.
tgt_text: Sweswi GEO yi na ku tlula 113 wa mifumo ya rixaka, leyi 30 ya yona yi humaka eAfrika na kwalomu ka 140 wa mihlangano leyi tekaka xiave, laha 11 wa leyi yi humaka eAfrika.

src_text: Selemong sena Kgwedi ena ya Botjhaba tla tsepamisa maikutlo mminong wa setso sa Afrika Borwa haholoholo wa Isicathamiya ha mmoho le kabelo ya ona dipapading, tsa bonono, tsa setso le botjhaba.
tgt_text: Afrika-Dzonga yi vile xirho xa Vurhangerinkulu xo gingirika xa kusukela hi 2005 naswona van’watisayense va ka hina sweswi va le ku tekeni ka xiave eka mapfhumba ya ndzavisiso yo hlayanyana lama rhangeriweke  hi ku tirhisa GEO.

src_text: Ka lepetjo lena ho ikemiseditswe ho keteka dilemo tse 60 sebini le moqapi wa dipina Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962) hlokahetse mme boela tsebisahale ka la Solomon Ntsele, eo leng moqapi wa pina ya, “Mbube”.
tgt_text: N’hweti ya Vutleketli ya Nhlangula (OTM) –.

src_text: Mokete wa Matjhaba wa 2022 wa Letsatsi la Ditaba tsa Mawatle.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi pasise ku simekiwa ka pfhumba ra OTM hi Mugqivela, 1 Nhlangula 2022, ehansi ka nhlokomhaka: “Sishov’ingolovane: swin’we hi aka miako ya vutleketli leyi akaka na ku hlayisa vutihanyisi”..     OTM ya lembe na lembe yi tirhisiwa ku tlakusa vulemukisi hi mayelana na vutleketli tanihi xin’wana xa swiphemu swa nkoka eka kula ka ikhonomi na nhluvukiso wa tindhawu.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla keteka Mokete wa Matjhaba wa 2022 wa Letsatsi la Ditaba tsa Mawatle mane Thekong ho tloha ka la 12 ho isa ka la 14 Mphalane.
tgt_text: Migingiriko yo hlayanyana yi ta endliwa ku kombisa swiphemu swo hambanahambana swa switirhisiwakulu swa vutleketli eka swa vuhahisi, malwandle, swifambo swa mani na mani na mapatu.

src_text: Mokete ona tla tshwarwa nakong ya OTM moo ka lona ho tlang ho etswa tlhokomediso ka dikepe jwalo ka lekala la dipalangwang.
tgt_text: Migingiriko leyi yi ta tlhela yi tlakusa vulemukisi hi mayelana na vuhlayiseki na vusirheleri bya vutleketli.

src_text: Moketeng ona ho tla ba teng le kemedi ho tswa dinaheng tse fapafapaneng ho tla iponela tsa indasteri ya dikepe ya Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Miburisano ya vakhomaxiave yi ta tlhela yi khomiwa ku burisana hi mitlhontlho yo hambanahambana eka sekitara ya vutleketli.

src_text: Afrika Borwa haesale le setho sa Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Dikepe ho tloha ka selemo sa.
tgt_text: Mfumo wu tshama wa ha tibohile ku antswisa switirhisiwakulu swa vutleketli swa tiko, havumbirhi eka tindhawu ta le matikoxikaya na ta le madorobeni, hi xikongomelo xo humelerisa mafambafambelo lama tirhaka kahle na lama hatlisaka ma nhundzu na vanhu.

src_text: Mokgatlo ona ke lekala le laolang tshebetso ya dikepe ho Matjhaba Kopaneng..     Kgwedi ya Bohahlaudi.
tgt_text: Nhlengeletano ya Vutshamo wa Nongoloko wa Vutshamo bya Vanhu ya Vun’we bya Tinxaka (UN-HABITAT).

src_text: Letsatsi la Matjhaba la Bohahlaudi (27 Loetse) Kgweding ena ya Bohahlaudi re tlo le keteka ka lepetjo le reng, “Re Nahana Botjha ka Bohahlaudi”.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi pasisile ku rhurheriwa ka nhlengeletano ya swirho swa UN-HABITAT eJoni hi masiku ya 16 na 17 Nhlangula..     Ndzawulo ya Vutshamo bya Vanhu yi ta hlanganisa nhlengeletano leya masiku mambirhi leswaku yi ngheneleriwa hi tinghwazi ta tipolitiki, vatirhi na valavisisi, ku katsa na swirhonkulu swa Komiti ya Vayimeri va Nkarhi hinkwawo ya  UN-HABITAT leyi kumekaka eNairobi, eKenya.

src_text: Tsa bohahlaudi kwano lapeng di bohlokwa bakeng sa kahobotjha ya lekala lena la bohahlaudi le karolo kgolo ya Lekeno la Afrika Borwa ha mmoho le ho thehwa ha mesebetsi..     Kabinete thabetse ho ntlafala ha lekala la kamohelo ya baeti le ntlafetseng ka mora sewa sa COVID-.
tgt_text: Timhakakulu leti ku faneleke ku vulavuriwa hi tona ti ta katsa ku lava miphalalo yo cinca ya swidakana na tindhawu ta doroba to hlakala..     Mivuyelo ya miburisano leyi yi ta fika emakumu loko ku simekiwa Rimba ra Kungu ra Matirhelo ra Misava Hinkwayo, leri ri nga ta andlariwa eka Huvo ya UN-HABITAT leswaku yi amukeriwa hi   Milawumbisi      .

src_text: Halofong ya pele ya 2022, ho bile le maeto lehae dimilione di.
tgt_text: Khansele ya Rixaka hi mayelana na Nawumbisi wa Madzolonga yo ya hi Rimbewu na ku Dlayeteriwa ka Vaxisati (GBVF) wa.

src_text: 2 leng keketseho ya persente tse 114 ha ho bapiswa le nako tshwanang selemong sa.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi pasise ku ringanyetiwa ka Khansele ya Rixaka hi mayelana na Nawumbisi wa GBVF wa 2021 ePalamente leswaku wu langutisisiwa ku ya emahlweni.

src_text: Sena se bontsha keketseho leha ho bapiswa le nako tshwanang ka selemo sa 2019 moo ho bileng le maeto lehae dimilione di.
tgt_text: Nawumbisi lowu wu nyika rimba ra nawu leswaku ku tumbuluxiwa huvo ya xinawu ku nyika mphalalo wa nkongomo eka ku tirhana na GBVF.

src_text: Jwalo ka karolo ya ho keteka Kgwedi ya Bohlaudi, Kabinete kgothaletsa Maafrika Borwa hore etele diprofensi tsa bona ka ho fapana..     Kabinete amohetse qeto ya Bofofise ba Belgium ba ho ba le difofane tse tlang Afrika Borwa ka ho otloloha ho qalang kgweding ena (Loetse) leng se tla matlafatsa lekala lena le ho netefatsa taba ya hore Afrika Borwa ke sebaka se setle sa bohahlaudi.
tgt_text: Wu tlhela wu lulamisela ku simekiwa ka Bodo ya Khansele leyi nga ta nyika vurhangeri bya xiqhinga ni ku vona ku angamela ka Kungu ra Xiqhinga ra Rixaka hi mayelana na GBVF, leri ri pasisiweke hi Khabinete hi Nhlangula 2020 leswaku ri tirhisiwa.

src_text: Sena se tla kenyeletsa difofane tse tla ya Kapa le Johannesburg jwalo ka beke     Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Bodo leyi yi ta na vuyimeri bya 51% kusuka eka vaaki lava nga na ku tsakela kun’we na 94% kusuka eka mfumo.

src_text: Diteboho    Kabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: Mopresidente William Samoei Ruto wa Kenya, ya neng behwa semmuso ka Labobedi la la 13 Loetse 2022, ho latela dikgetho tse se nang morusu tse neng di tshwerwe ka la 9 Phato.
tgt_text: Nawumbisi lowu wu se wu hundzile eka ku nyikiwa ka mavonelo ya vanhu.

src_text: Motlatsi wa Mopresidente, Ntate David Mabuza ne le teng moketeng oo ho emela Mopresidente Ramaphosa, mmuso le setjhaba sa Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Nawumbisi wa Vulawuri bya Swikumiwa swa Fole na Tisisiteme ta Mphakelo ta Xielekitironiki wa.

src_text: Mokgatlo wa Afrika Borwa wa Rabi ha mmoho le Toropo ya Kapa ka ho tshwara ka katleho Mohope wa Lefatshe wa borobedi wa Rugby Sevens ho tloha ka la 9 ho isa ka la 11 Loetse ne le lekgetlo la pele tonamente ena tshwarelwa Afrika, mme seo se bontsha hantle hore Afrika Borwa tumme hantle ka kamohelo ya baeti..     Matshediso     Kabinete fetisetsa matshediso yona ho malapa le metswalle ya:  Bana ba sekolo ba 18 le batho ba baholo ba babedi ba ileng ba hlokahala kotsing nyarosang ka Labohlano la la 16 Loetse mane Phongola, KwaZulu-Natal ka mora hore lori thulane le vene tsamaisang bana ba sekolo     Kgiro.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi pasise ku ringanyetiwa ka Nawumbisi wa Vulawuri bya Swikumiwa swa Fole na Tisisiteme ta Mphakelo ta Xielekitironiki wa 2018 ePalemente, lowu lavaka ku herisa Nawu wa Vulawuri bya Swikumiwa swa Fole wa sweswi, 1993 (Nawu wa 83 wa 1993), tanihilaha wu hundzuluxiweke hakona..     Nawumbisi lowu wu tlhela wu lava ku tiyisa magoza ya rihanyo ra vaaki ya tiko na ku ma fambelanisa na Ntwanano wa Rimba ra Nhlangano wa Rihanyo wa Misava hi mayelana na Vulawuri bya Fole.

src_text: Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang     Ntate Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale jwalo ka Molaodi Kakaretso (DG): Mokomeshenara wa Naha wa Lefapha la Tlhabollo ya Batshwaruwa     Ngaka Malixole Percival Mahlati Motlatsi wa Molaodi Kakaretso DDG: Ya Karolong sebetsang ka Dipetlele le Thuto Phahameng ho tsa Bophelo bo Botle le Ntshetsopele ya Ditaba tsa Basebetsi Lefapheng la tsa Bophelo     Ntate Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki jwalo ka Moabi wa Lefatshe ya ka Sehloohong Lefapheng la tsa Temo, Ntlafatso ya tsa Mobu le ho Ntlafatswa ha Dibaka tsa Mahaeng     Ntate Phaswa Phineas Mamogale Motsamaisi ya ka Sehloohong wa Ditjhelete Lefapheng la tsa Bophelo..     Kabinete dumellana le ho hirwa ha batho ba latelang     Ntate Tshediso Matona jwalo ka Mokomeshenara wa Komeshene ya Tshehetso ya ba Batsho Moruong (BBBEE)     Ditho tsa Boto ya Maipiletso ya Difilimi le Diphatlalatso: Ntate Siyazi Tyamtyam (Modulasetulo); Mme Sohani Natasha Chundhur;Mme Sisanda Nkoala;Mme Shandukani Mulaudzi;Mme Nomaswazi Rachel Shabangu-Mndawe;Ngaka Litheko Modisane;Mme Phuti Nehemia Phukubje;Mme James Shikwambana; leMme Manko Thalitha Bufffel kgethilwe hape).
tgt_text: Nawumbisi lowu, exikarhi ka swin’wana, wu ringanyeta ku nga dzahiwi ka 100% endzeni ka miako na le ka tindhawu tin’wana ta le handle ka miako; ku yirisiwa ko xavisa tisigarete hi ku tirhisa michini yo xavisa, na ku tiyisa mapakatelelo ya tisigarete na mifungho yo lemukisa.

src_text: Paballo ya Metsi.
tgt_text: Nsirhelelo wa mati.

src_text: Kabinete leboha Maafrika Borwa ka ho ikobela dipehelo mabapi le ho fokotswa ha phepelo ya metsi dikarolong tse itseng tsa Johannesburg, Tshwane le Ekurhuleni ka boiteko ba ho imolla mehlodi ya rona.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi khense vanhu va Afrika-Dzonga eka ku landzelela swipimelo swa mati leswi tirhisiweke eka swiphemu swo karhi swa Joni, Tshwane na Ekurhuleni ku tshamisekisa ntalo wa vuhlayiselamati.

src_text: Mehlodi le matamo rona tlasa kgatello kgolo ka lebaka la maemo motjheso phahameng Gauteng leng se qobelletseng ba ha Rand Water ho fokotsa phepelo ya bona ya metsi ho bommasepala bana.
tgt_text: Madamu na vuhlayiselamati swi tshama swi ri ehansi ka ntshikelelo hikwalaho ka mahiselo ya le henhla eGauteng, naswona ku laviwa loku tlakukeke ku sindzise Rand Water ku hunguta mphakelo wa mati eka timasipala hi mpimo lowukulu.

src_text: Khamphane ena ya metsi fepela batho ba fetang dimilione tse 11 Gauteng le karolong tse ding tsa Mpumalanga, Foreisitata le Leboya Bophirima..   Ho fokotswa hona ha phepelo ka hona ho ikemiseditswe ho leka ho baballa metsi ho fihlela maemo ntlafala.
tgt_text: Vulawuri bya mati byi phakela mati yo nwa yo tala eka kutlula 11 wa timiliyoni ta vanhu eGauteng, swiphemu swa Mpumalanga, Free State na N'walungu-Vupeladyambu.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho setjhaba hore se tswele pele ho ikobela dipehelo tsa ho fokotswa hona ha phepelo ya metsi ka hore se sebedise ka nepo..   Seteraeke sa ha Transnet.
tgt_text: Swipimelo leswo ka swi nga papalateki swi na xikongomelo xa ku sirhelela mphakelo wa mati naswona swi ta tshama swi ri kona kufikelaloko xiyimo lexi xi antswa.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse tumellano ya nyollelo ya meputso ya dilemo tse tharo fihletsweng ke mokgatlo wa basebetsi wa United National Transport Union (UNTU), le Transnet tla qala morao ho tloha ka la 1 Mmesa 2022 ho fihlela ka la 31 Tlhakubele.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi kombele vaaki ku landzelela swipimelo swa mati na ku tlanga xiphemu xa vona hi ku tirhisa xipfuno lexo kala hi switsongotsongo.

src_text: Komeshene ya Tharollo ya Ditaba tsa Basebetsi (CCMA) ke yona neng laola dipuisano tsena mme sena se tlisitse mohwanto ona wa ditho tsa UNTU pheletsong hanghang.
tgt_text: itereko xa Transnet.

src_text: Kabinete boetse ya amohela kgoeletso ya mokgatlo wa basebetsi wa South African Transport and Allied Workers Union wa ho fedisa seteraeke sa bona..   Kabinete amohela hape boinehelo ba Transnet ba ho shebana le mosebetsi wa ho leka ho fokotsa mosebetsi saletseng morao boemakepeng le ditereneng tse tsamaisang thepa bakilweng ke seteraeke sena leng se ammeng moruo wa naha le bohle ba tshepetseng tshebeletsong ya Transnet..   Kabinete leboha tshehetso le tshebedisano mmoho bontshitsweng ke dikgwebo nakong ena ya seteraeke.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi amukele ntwanano wa muholo wa malembe manharhu lowu fikeleriweke exikarhi ka Transnet na United National Transport Union (UNTU), lowu nga ta tirha eka nkarhi wa 1 Dzivamisoko 2022 kufika 31 Nyenyanyana.

src_text: Kabinete kgothaletsa taba ya hore dikamano tsena di tswele pele pakeng tsa Transnete le mekgatlo ya basebetsi molemong wa khamphane le moruo wa naha..   Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le naha ya Saudi Arabia.
tgt_text: Khomixini ya Mbuyelelano, Vulamuri na Vuahluri yi lamurile eka ntwanano lowu, leswi swi fikiseke emakumu xitereko xa vatirhi hi swirho swa UNTU hi nkarhi wolowo.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ketelo bileng le katleho ya Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa naheng ya Saudi Arabia ka la 15 le la 16 Mphalane.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi tlhele yi amukela xiboho hi South African Transport and Allied Workers Union ku herisa xitereko lexi.

src_text: Ketelong ena dinaha tsena tse pedi di ile tsa saena ditumellano tse 17 makaleng mangata kenyeletsang la temo, botshwasi ba dihlapi, la merafo, ho fehlwa ha motlakase ka tsela ya tlhaho, tsa tshireletso, dipalangwang le la tlhahiso ya dimela le diphoofolo tsa lewatleng.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi amukele vutiboheleri hi Transnet ku kongomisa eka ku hetisiwa ka mitirho leya saleleke endzhaku loku humeleleke eka mihlaluko na le swiporweni hi nkarhi wa xitereko xa vatirhi, leswi swi khumbeke hi ndlela yo homboloka ikhonomi na tisekitara leti ti tshembelaka eka vukorhokeri bya yona..   Khabinete yi hundzise ku khensa ka yona eka nseketelo na ntirhisano lowu nyikiweke hi bindzu hi nkarhi wa xitereko lexi.

src_text: Ho boetswe ha saenwa le ditumellano tsa ho thehwa ha Moifo wa tsa Kgwebo le tshebedisano ho tsa sesole le theko ya thepa ya mmuso ha mmoho le tsa tlhahlobo ya maemo lefatshe..   Mopresidente sebedisitse monyetla ona ho mema ba tsa kgwebo Saudi Arabia ho tla sebokeng sa bohlano sa matsete sa Afrika Borwa se tla ba isao ka.
tgt_text: Yi khutaza vuxaka lebyi yaka emahlweni exikarhi ka vufambisi na vatirhi va Transnet ku vuyerisa khamphani na ikhonomi ya tiko.

src_text: Saudi Arabia ke naha ya bobedi ka boholo hwebelanang le Afrika Borwa dinaheng tsa Botjhabela ba Bohareng mme hape ke naha eo ho yona ho rekwang thepa ngata tikolohong ena.
tgt_text: Vuxaka bya Afrika-Dzonga – Saudi Arabia.

src_text: Dikamano tsa dinaha tsena di tlisitse tshebedisano ntle ho tsa kgwebo le matsete..   Matsete Meralo ya Motheo.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi amukele Rendzo ro Tirha leri humeleleke kuya eKingdom of Saudi Arabia hi Phuresidente Cyril Ramaphosa hi masiku ya 15 na 16 Nhlangula.

src_text: Kabinete amohela taba ya ho simollwa ha sitsi sa tlhahiso sa dihlahiswa tsa polasitiki sa maemo pele mane Lanseria Gauteng ke khamphane ya matjhaba ya ALPLA Group.
tgt_text: Hi nkarhi wa rendzo leri, matiko lamambirhi ma sayine 17 wa Timemorandamu ta Ntwanano (tiMoU) eka tindzima to hambanahambana to tanihi vurimi, indasitiri ya tinhlampfi, vucelamigodi, eneji leyi vuyelerisekaka, nsirhelelo, vutleketli na swimila na swiharhi swa le lwandle ku endla swakudya.

src_text: Sena se paka boinehelo ba Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba ho ntshetsa meralo ya motheo pele jwalo ka mokgwa wa ho nyolla moruo le menyetla ya mosebetsi..   Sena ke projeke ya matsete bitsang tjhelete dimilione di 50 tsa ditollara tsa Amerika mme ke karolo ya projeke ya moralo wa Toropo sebedisang Marangrang ya Lanseria.
tgt_text: TiMoU tin'wana leti sayiniweke ti hi mayelana na ku tumbuluxiwa ka Khansele ya Mabindzu ya Nhlanganelo, ntirhisano eka ndzima ya tiindasitiri ta swa nyimpi na maxavelo ya tinhundzu na vukorhokeri, na hi mayelana na ntirhisano wa mivalango ya ntivoxivumbekomisava.

src_text: Projeke ena tla hlahisa botsitso moruong thehe le mesebetsi ka bang.
tgt_text: Phuresidente tirhise rendzo leri ku rhamba mabindzu ya le Saudi Arabia kuya eka khomferense ya vuvekisi ya vuntlhanu ya Afrika-Dzonga leyi yi nga ta khomiwa hi.

src_text: Projeke ena kenyeletsa le mananeo 36 thupello ya boratekginiki ho tsa motlakase le ho lokiswa ha metjhini mmoho le ho tsoselletswa botjha ha dintho tse lahlilweng.
tgt_text: Saudi Arabia mutirhisani lonkulu wa vumbirhi wa Afrika-Dzonga eVuxa-Xikarhi naswona xihlovo lexikulu kutlula hinkwaswo xa switundziwa kusuka eka xifundza lexi.

src_text: Ba rupelletsweng lenaneong lena ba tla sebetsa ho ALPLA Group dinaheng tsohle tse Afrika ka borwa.
tgt_text: Vuxaka bya matiko ya misava exikarhi ka matiko hamambirhi byi vangile xitandzhaku eka mabindzu na maendlekelo ya vuvekisi.

src_text: Lenaneo lena la thupello le tla qala ka 2023 mme ba 12 ba pele ho tla rupellwa ba tla kgethwa hona mona setjhabeng..   Ho Rashwa Ntle le Molao.
tgt_text: Vuvekisi bya switirhisiwakulu.

src_text: Ho rashwa ntle le molao ho lematsa setjhaba le moruo wa rona.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi amukele ku endliwa ka pulanti ya vuhumesi bya tipulasitiki ya ximanguvalawa hi muendli wa matiko ya misava wo rhangela, ALPLA Group, eLanseria eGauteng.

src_text: Sena se tlisa tahlehelo ya lekeno mmusong le lekaleng la merafo..   Kabinete thabetse ho hatjwa ha dithunya le ho tshwarwa ha babelaellwa ba 20 ba belaellwang ketsong tsena tsa ho rafa ntle le molao mane Stillfontein Leboya Bophirima..   Kabinete etsa boipiletso ho mekgatlo qobellang melao ho netefatsa hore matsholo bona a atleha.
tgt_text: Leyi yi engetela vutiboheleri bya Phuresidente Ramaphosa ku veka nhluvukiso wa switirhisiwakulu eka xiyimo tanihi  ndlela ya ku hlohlotela ikhonomi na ku engetela mitirho..   Vuvekisi lebyi nga na nkoka wa US$50 wa timiliyoni vuhoxaxandlakulu eka kungukulu ra Lanseria Smart City leri ri nga ta lawula vuyisekamahlweni na ku vuyelerisa switirhisiwa xikan'we na ku tumbuluxa na ku yisa emahlweni 350 wa mitirho.

src_text: Sena se tla romela molaetsa pakang hore tlolo tsa molao ha di na molemo, dinokwane di tshwarwa di kwallwe ntle le tshabo..   Motlakase.
tgt_text: Leswi swi katsiweke hi nongoloko wa vudyondzisantirho wa 36 wa timakhetironiki na van'wavuthekiniki vo vuyelerisa eka mitirho ya ALPLA Group eAfrika ya le dzongeni hinkwayo.

src_text: Eskom sa tswa saena tumellano ya dilemo tse 30 le bahlahisi ba ikemetseng ba tla fehla motlakase seteisheneng sa Majuba le sa Tutuka mane Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Nongoloko lowa vudyondzisantirho wu ta sungula hi 2023, ku ri na vadyondzisiwantirho va le Afrika-Dzonga va 12 lavo sungula lava humaka emigangeni ya kwala tikweni.

src_text: Kgiro ya lefatshe leo ho tlo ahwa diteishene tsena ho lona le tla tlisa matsete ballwang ho dibilione tse 40 tsa diranta..   Dikhamphane tse nne tse tla fehla motlakase ona ke – HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Sola Group le Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – mme di tla eketsa motlakase wa 2 000 megawatts phepelong ya naha.
tgt_text: Vucelamigodi lebyi nga riki enawini.

src_text: Motlakase ona tla hokelwa phepelong ya naha dikgweding tse 24 ho isa ho tse 36 ka mora ho phethelwa ha ditlhoko tse hlokahalang tsa ditjhelete mmoho le ditumello tse mabapi le tshebediso ya mobu..   Paballo ya Tlhahiso ya Dijo.
tgt_text: Vucelamigodi lebyi nga riki enawini byi vavisa miganga na ikhonomi ya hina, naswona byi vanga ndzahleko wa malinhlengeleto eka havumbirhi bya mfumo na sekitara ya vucelamigodi..   Khabinete yi amukele ku tekiwa ka xisaka xa swibalesa na ku khomiwa ka 20 wa vaehleketeleriwa lava xakelanisiweke na vucelamigodi lebyi nga riki enawini hi nkarhi wa oparexini emuhochweni wa mugodi eStilfontein eN'walungu-Vupeladyambu.

src_text: Kabinete amohela ho tshwarwa ha seboka sa Agri SA sa 2022 mane Tshwane ka la 13 le 14 Mphalane 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Re Hlahisa tsa Lehae”.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi kombela vanhu va le Afrika-Dzonga ku ya emahlweni va tirhisana na tiejensi ta nsindziso wa nawu ku tiyisisa ku humelela ka tioparexini to lwisana na vugevenga ta nkarhi lowu taka.

src_text: Sebokeng sena ho sekasekilwe taba tse kenyeletsang moralo bakeng sa tlhahiso ya lehae, meralo ya motheo bakeng sa bahlahisi ba lehae; ho etsa tikoloho ya rona dumelle tlhahiso ya dijo bakeng sa nako tlang ha mmoho le ho thusa bahlahisi ba lehae tshebetsong ya bona ya ho hlahisa dijo kwano..   Bakeng sa paballo ya nako tlang ya tlhahiso ya dijo, Kabinete amohetse ho thehwa ha Sitsi sa Naha sa Thibelo ya Ditshwaetso tse amang Leruo le Dijalo.
tgt_text: Leswi swi ta rhumela xihungwana xo tiya xa leswaku vugevenga byi hakeli, na leswaku swigevenga swi ta khomiwa na ku tengisiwa ku ri hava nchavo kumbe ku rhandziwa..   Eneji.

src_text: Sena se etswa ke Lekala la Mahlale tsa Temo Lefapheng la Saense le Mahlale ka kopanelo le Yunivesithi ya Tshwane.
tgt_text: Eskom ya ha sayina mitwanano ya vulombisi bya 30 wa malembe na vavekisi va vahumesi va gezi lava tiyimelaka ku aka ntalo wo endla eneji yo basa wuntshwa eka switichi swa gezi swa Majuba na Tutuka eMpumalanga.

src_text: Sitsi sena se tla thusa thibelong le ho fokotseng ditshwaetso tsa dijalo le diphoofolo leng se tla tshehetsa tlhahiso ya dijo le ntshetsopele ya dibaka tsa mahaeng   Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Vulombisi lebya misava byi ta koka rinoko ra vuvekisi lebyi kumbeteriwaka bya kwalomu ka R40 wa tibiliyoni.

src_text: Ho Lokiswa ha Tokomane ya Mokgatlo wa Dinaha tsa Afrika.
tgt_text: Mune wa vavekisi lava – HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Sola Group na Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – va ta hoxa xandla eka mpimohansi wa 2 000 ya timegawati eka giridi ya gezi ya rixaka.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tokomane ya Mokgatlo wa Dinaha tsa Afrika bakeng sa Dipehelo, Keketso ya Matla Tshebetso, Taolo ya Bommasepala le Ntshetso pele ya bona ho tla tla lokiswa.
tgt_text: Ntalo wo endla gezi lowuntshwa wu languteriwa ku khomanisiwa eka giridi ku ha si hela 24 kufika eka 36 wa tin'hweti kusuka eka mpfalelo wa timali, ku ri karhi ku landzeleriwa mipasiso yo lawula ya mbangu, yo tsema tindhawu na yin'wana.

src_text: Afrika Borwa ne saene Tokomane ena ka Phato.
tgt_text: Nsirhelelo wa swakudya.
Khabinete yi amukele ku rhurheriwa ka Ntsombano wa Agri SA wa 2022 ePitori hi masiku ya 13 na 14 Nhlangula 2022 ehansi ka nkongomelo: “Ku Rima swa laha Tikweni”.

src_text: Tokomane ena ya Keketso ya Matla Tshebetso fana ka moralo dinaheng tsohle tseo leng ditho mabapi le taba ya keketso ya tsela tsa tshebetso ho tloha boemong ba naha ho isa maemong ohle mmuso.
tgt_text: Ntsombano lowu vulavurisane hi mayelana na timhaka to tanihi ku endla ntirho wa makungukulu ya vurimi ya varimi va laha tikweni; switirhisiwakulu leswi yisekaka emahlweni eka swakudya leswi rimiweke laha tikweni; ku endliwa ka mbangu wa laha tikweni wu va lowu yisekaka emahlweni eka ntshovelo wa swakudya swa laha tikweni kuya eka nkarhi lowu taka, na ku tiyisiwa ka vuswikoti bya vatshoveri va swakudya ku phurosesa swirin'wa leswi rimiweke laha tikweni.

src_text: Tokomane ena shebane haholo le temana ya katoloso ya matla tshebetso maemong bommasepala le ntshetsopele ya bona..   Kopano ya Matjhaba ya bo 32 ya Selemo le Selemo ya Polokeho Ditereneng (IRSC).
tgt_text: Eka ku rhangisiwa ku ya emahlweni ka nsirhelelo wa swakudya, Khabinete yi tlhele yi amukela ku simekiwa ka Habu ya Nsirhelelaswihanyi ya Rixaka hi Nongoloko wa Xinakulobye xa Vutumbuluxi bya Ikhonomiswihanyi ya Vurimi wa Ndzawulo ya Sayense na Vutumbuluxi, hi ku tirhisana na Yunivhesiti ya Pitori.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarelwa ha kopano ya bo 32 ya Selemo le Selemo ya IRSC Johannesburg ho tloha ka la 1 ho isa ka la 6 Mphalane 2023, tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Re lokisa diterene tsa rona Maemong sa Lokang”.
tgt_text: Habu leyi yi ta seketela nsivelo, hunguto na malawulelo ya vuvabyi bya swirin'wa na swiharhi, leswi swi nga ta hoxa xandla eka ntshovelo, nsirhelelo wa swakudya na nhluvukiso wa matikoxikaya lowu yisekaka emahlweni   Swiboho swa Khabinete.

src_text: IRSC ke foramo ya matjhaba kopanyang ditsebi ho tsa polokeho ho tsa diterene boemong ba matjhaba ho tla hlabana malotsana ka tsa ntlafatso ya polokeho ditereneng..   Mokgatlo wa Afrika Borwa wa tsa Polokeho ho tsa Diterene ne qetele ho tshwara kopano ena ka selemo sa.
tgt_text: Ku Pfumeleriwa Ximfumo ka Chatara ya Vuhangalasi bya Matimba ya Yuniyoni ya Afrika (AU).

Khabinete yi pasise xiringanyeto xo ya ePalamende xa Chatara ya AU hi mayelana na Mikhuvanene na Milawu ya Vuhangalasi bya Matimba, Mafumelo ya le Tikweni na Nhluvukiso wa le Tikweni ku ya pfumeleriwa ximfumo.

src_text: Mokgahlelo wa Bobedi wa Moralo wa Naha wa Selemo sa 2050 wa Meralo ya Motheo (NIP 2050).
tgt_text: Afrika-Dzonga yi sayine chatara leyi hi Mhawuri..   Chatara ya Vuhangalasi bya Matimba yi nyika rimba eka matiko lama nga swirho hinkwawo dokhumente yo letela hi mayelana na vuhangalasi bya matimba na mitirho kusuka eka mfumo wa rixaka kuya eka swiyenge swa swin'wana swa mfumo.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho hatiswa ha mokgahlelo wa bobedi wa moralo wa NIP 2050 bukeng ya diphatlalatso tsa mmuso bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: Chatara leyi yi tirhana ngopfungopfu na vuhangalasi bya vulawuri na mitirho, rimba ra mafumelo ya le tikweni na nhluvukiso wa le tikweni.

src_text: Moralo ona fana ka tataiso tabeng ya maano tshebetso le diprojeke tsa mmuso..   Moralo ona hlwaya ditshebetso tsa diprojeke lekaleng la ho dudiswa ha setjhaba, ditshebeletso tsa bommasepala tse kenyeletsang motlakase; metsi; ho thothwa ha matlakala; dipalangwang tsa setjhaba; meralo ya motheo ya tsa thuto, bophelo le dijithale le thibelo ya bobodu le bonokwane..   Moralo ona bontsha moo ho hlokahalang ho tsepamiswa maikutlo teng, le ho lekola maemo teng renang ha jwale le se tlamehang ho etswa bakeng sa ho fihlela tjhebelo pele ya moralo ona.
tgt_text: Khansele ya Vuhlayiseki bya le Swiporweni ya Matiko ya Misava ya Lembe na Lembe ya vu32 (IRSC).

src_text: Moralo ona eletsa hore tshebetso ya moralo ona be ya nako ya dilemo tse tharo.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi pasise ku rhurheriwa ka Nhlengeletano ya IRSC ya Lembe na Lembe ya vu32 eJoni kusuka 1 kufika 6 Nhlangula 2023 ehansi ka nkongomelo: “Ku vumbiwa hi vuntshwa ka swiporo eka Misava leyi kanakanisaka”.

src_text: Moralo wa Naha wa Ntlafatso ya Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso.
tgt_text: IRSC foramu ya matiko ya misava leyi yi tisaka endhawini yin'we tiphurofexinali ta vuhlayiseki bya le swiporweni kusuka emisaveni hinkwayo ku cincanisa mitokoto ku endlela ku antswisa vuhlayiseki bya le swiporweni..   Tanihi xirho xa IRSC, Mulawuri wa Vuhlayiseki bya le Swiporweni wa Afrika-Dzonga rhurhele rohetelela foramu leyi hi.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kengwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Naha wa Ntlafatso ya Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso.
tgt_text: Xiyimo xa 2 xa Kungu ra Switirhisiwakulu ra Rixaka ra Mpfapfarhuto ra 2050 (NIP 2050).

src_text: Moralo ona ne phatlalatswe ka selemo sa 2021 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba..  Moralo ona fana ka ditshiya tse hlano mabapi le ho ntlafatsa Mokgwa wa Tshebetso wa Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi pasise ku gazetiwa ka Xiyimo xa 2 xa NIP ya 2050 ya mpfapfarhuto leswaku vaaki va nyika mavonelo.

src_text: Ditshiya tsena di kenyeletsa tsela ya kamohelo ya ba sa tswa hirwa Ditshebeletsong tsa Mmuso; tataiso ya mosebetsi ho ba sa tswa hirwa; meralo le ho behwa leihlo ha tsela eo basebeletsi ba sebetsang ka yona; thupello tswellang ha mmoho le menyetla ya ntlafatso ya maemo thuto..   Diphetoho dipehelong tsa kgiro ya Balaodi Kakaretso (bo DG).
tgt_text: Kungu leri ri nyika mafambelo eka ku tiyisa na ku engetela tiphurojeke leti pfanganisiweke ta xiqhinga ta mfumo..   Ri kuma tiphurojeke ta xiqhinga eka matshamelo ya vanhu; gezi ra masipala; mati; thyaka ro tiya; vutleketli bya mani na mani; switirhisiwakulu swa dyondzo na swa rihanyo; switirhisiwakulu swa xidijitali, na vugevenga na vukungundzwana.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tlaleho sisinyang dipehelo le boiphihlelo boo ba hirwang jwalo ka Balaodi Kakaretso Mafapheng Mmuso ba tlamehang ho ba le bona.
tgt_text: Xivumbeko xa kungu leri xi nyika xivono xa xiyenge lexi ku faneleke ku tirhaniwa na xona, xi nyika nhlahluvo wa xiyimo xa nkarhi wa sweswi, xi katsakanya swiyimo swa nkoka swa ku humelela naswona xi vula leswaku swidingo swihi leswi swi faneleke ku endliwa ku kota ku fikelela xivono lexi.

src_text: Tlaleho ena tla le ditshisinyo tse ngata tse kenyeletsang nako ya kgiro ya bo DG le tsela eo ba maemong hodimo taolo ba abang ka teng mosebetsi ho basebeletsi ba tsa ditjhelete nngwe ya ditshisinyo ke ya hore DG ofising ya Mopresidente boele be yena Hlooho ya Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba.
tgt_text: Xi ringanyeta phurosese ya matirhiselo leyi yi fanele ku tekiwa eka kungu ra matirhelo ra ndzhendzeleko lowu yaka emahlweni wa malembe manharhu.

src_text: Maemong diprofensi sena se tla kengwa ofising ya ditonakgolo.
tgt_text: Rimba ra Matirhiselo ra Rixaka eka Ku Endliwa ka Xiphurofexinali ka Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo.

src_text: Tlaleho ena boetse fana ka tataiso ya ka moo mafapha tlang ho laola ka yona ditumellano tsa kgiro tsa bo DG..   Ho boetse ho na le diphetoho ho tsela eo ho lekolwang Maemo Tshebetso bo DG hore di tsamaisane le diphetoho tse tokomaneng ena.. 4   Bekeng tlang Letona le Tshwereng Mokobobo la Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba, Ntate Thulas Nxesi tla bitsa seboka sa boraditaba ho tla phatlalatsa tsela eo Moralo wa Ntlafatso ya Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso tla kengwa tshebetsong ka teng le ho hlopholla diphetoho tse entsweng dipehelong tsa kgiro ya bo DG..   Tlaleho ya Bohlano ya Kgatelopele ya ho Kengwa Tshebetsong ha Tokomane ya Tshebetso Mabapi le Ditokelo tsa Batho ba sa Itekanelang ya 2020-2021 (WPRPD).
tgt_text: Khabinete yi pasise Rimba ra Matirhiselo ra Rixaka eka Ku Endliwa ka Xiphurofexinali ka Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Tlaleho ya Bohlano ya Kgatelopele ya ho Kengwa Tshebetsong ha WPRPD fanang ka kgatelopele ho kengweng tshebetsong ha WPRPD.
tgt_text: Rimba leri ri kandziyisiwile leswaku vaaki va nyika mavonelo hi.

src_text: Tlaleho ena na le diphehiso ho tswa mafapheng naha le diprofensi kenyeletsang le kabo ya teng ya ditjhelete..   Tlaleho ya pele ne phatlalatswe ka selemo sa.

Ena ya bohlano se tjhaetswe monwana hore ka hatiswa bukeng ya diphatlalatso tsa mmuso ke Lefapha la Basadi, Batjha le Batho ba sa Itekanelang..   Diphetoho Karolong ya bo 20(1) ya Tumellano ya ho Fokotsa Kgethollo Kgahlano le Basadi (CEDAW).
tgt_text: Rimba leri ri nyika ntlhanu wa tiphuphu hi mayelana na miphalalo eka ku endliwa ka xiphurofexinali ka Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha diphetoho Karolong ya bo 20(1) ya CEDAW ho tla lokiswa.
tgt_text: Tiphuphu leti ti katsa leswi endliwaka ku nga si thoriwa na ku hlawuriwa endzeni ka Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo; ku tivisiwa ka mutirhi na ku amukeriwa ka mutirhi entirhweni; nkunguhato na malawulelo ya matirhelo; ku dyondza loku yaka emahlweni na nhluvukiso wa xiphurofexinali, ku ya emahlweni ka ntirhovutomi na timhangu ta ntirhovutomi .

src_text: Diphetoho tsena di bolela ka ho eketswa ha nako ya dikopano tsa komiti sekasekanang le ditlaleho tsa dinaha tseo leng ditho..   Afrika Borwa ne saene tumellano ena ka 1993 mme ya lokiswa ka Tshitwe.
tgt_text: Ku cinca eka swipimelo swa le ntirhweni swa Valawuri-Jenerala (tiDG).

src_text: Ho tliswa ha yona Palamenteng ho etsetswa hore tokomane ena kgone ho tsamaisana le diphetoho tsa Karolo ya bo 20(1) ya tumellano ena.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi pasise xiviko lexi xi ringanyetaka magoza ku tiyisa vuswikoti bya tiDG eka Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo.

src_text: Tumellano ya Matjhaba ya Kamohelo ya Mangolo Thuto Phahameng.
tgt_text: Xiviko lexi xi endle swiringanyeto swo talanyana, ku katsa na nkarhi wa ku va ehofisini wa tiDG na malawulelo ya vurhumisi hi Vulawuri bya Vurhangerinkulu eka vaofisiri va tinkota..   Xiviko lexi xi tlhele xi ringanyeta leswaku DG ya le Hofisini ya Phuresidente yi ta thoriwa tanihi Nhloko ya Mafambiselo ya Mfumo.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tumellano ya Matjhaba ya Kamohelo ya Mangolo Thuto Phahameng bakeng sa tokiso.
tgt_text: Eka swifundzakulu, ntirho lowu wu ta nyikiwa tiDG leri nga etihofisini ta Tiphurimiya.

src_text: Ha se lokisitswe tla romelwa ho Matjhaba Kopaneng lekaleng la teng la Thuto, Saense le tsa Botjhaba leng se etswang ho latela Molao wa Naha Laolang Mangolo Thuto Phahameng wa 2008 (Molao wa bo 67 wa 2008).
tgt_text: Xiviko xi ye emahlweni xi ringanyeta magoza ku letela tindzawulo hi mayelana na malawulelo ya tikontiraka ta tiDG.

src_text: Tumellano ena ya Matjhaba maikemisetso yona ke ho netefatsa hore ha ho kgethollo boemong ba matjhaba kamohelong ya mangolo thuto phahameng.
tgt_text: Sisiteme ya Malawulelo ya Matirhelo leyi pfuxetiweke ya tiDG yi le ku pfuxetiweni ku yi fambelanisa na ku cinca loku pasisiweke.

src_text: Sena se etsa hore dinaha tseo leng ditho di amohele maemo thuto dinaha tse 193 tseo leng ditho tsa Matjhaba Kopaneng.
tgt_text: 4  Holobye wo Khomela wa Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo na Mafambiselo, Ttn Thulas Nxesi, vhiki leri taka ta rhamba nhlengeletano ya swihangalasamahungu ku hlamusela hi ku komisa Rimba ra Matirhiselo ra Rixaka eka ku Endliwa ka Xipfurofexinali ka Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo na ku tlhela tlhantlha ku cinca ku loku pasisiweke eka swipimelo swa le ntirhweni swa tiDG.

src_text: 9  Ho tlohelwa ha diphetoho Bukaneng ya Merokotso ya Ditho tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Xiviko xa Ndzima leyi Khatsiweke xa Vuntlhanu hi mayelana na Matirhiselo ya Phepha ra Swibumabumelo ra Mfumo hi mayelana na Vanhu lava nga na Vutsoniwa (WPRPD) ra 2020-.

src_text: 1   Kabinete dumellane le phatlalatso ya ofisi ya Mopresidente ya ka Mantaha wa la 17 Mphalane 2022 ya ho tlohelwa ha diphetoho tse neng di entswe Bukaneng ya Merokotso ya Ditho tsa Kabinete ya.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi pasise Xiviko xa Ndzima leyi Khatsiweke xa Vuntlhanu hi mayelana na Matirhiselo ya WPRPD, lexi xi nyikaka vuxokoxoko byintshwa hi mayelana na matirhiselo ya WPRPD.

src_text: 2  Diphetoho tsena tse neng di etswe ka Mmesa 2022, di ne di eketsa merokotso diofising tsa Matona ikarabellang mafapheng fetang le le leng.
tgt_text: Xiviko lexi xi angarhela swibumabumelo kusuka eka tindzawulo ta mfumo ta rixaka na ta swifundzakulu.

src_text: Di ne di boetse di bolela ha mmuso tla lefella ka botlalo motlakase le metsi moo matona dulang teng.. 3  Kabinete mametse kgoeletso ya setjhaba mme ya nka qeto ya ho lekola diphetoho tsena botjha.
tgt_text: Xi nyika vuxokoxoko byintshwa hi mayelana na matirhiselo ya pholisi lama ma katsaka miavelo ya mpimanyeto..   Xiviko xa ku ya emahlweni xa lembe na lembe xo sungula xi kandziyisiwile hi.

src_text: Ho lekolwa botjha hona ho tla etswa ke komiti ikemetseng mme tlaleho ya teng tla phatlalatswa ho websaete ya Lefapha la Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso: www.dpsa.gov.za.10  Tshebedisano Diphetohong tsa ho Fokotsa ho Silafala ha Moya (JETP) ha mmoho le Moralo wa Matsete JETP, (JETP-IP).
tgt_text: Xiviko xa ndzima leyi khatsiweke xa vuntlhanu xi pasisiwile ku va xi gazetiwa na ku kandziyisiwa hi Ndzawulo ya Vavasati, Vantshwa na Vanhu lava nga na Vutsoniwa.

src_text: 1  Ka mora ho amohela ho phatlalatswa JETP le JETP-IP, Kabinete tjhaetse JETP-IP monwana mme ya leboha le mosebetsi wa ho hlahisa.. 2  JETP-IP hlakisa se hlokahalang ho etswa bakeng sa hore mmuso finyelle maikemisetso ona ho fokotsa ho silafala ha moya ho ka tlisa diphetoho setjhabeng le ho basebeletsi ba amehang.. 3  Komiti ya Matona ya ho Fetoha ha Maemo Lehodimo tla bitsa seboka sa boraditaba haufinyane ho tla fana ka lesedi le eketsehileng   Ditshisinyo tsa Molao.
tgt_text: Hundzuluxo eka Atikili ya 20(1) ya Ntwanano hi mayelana na ku Herisiwa ka Mixaka Hinkwayo ya Xihlawuhlawu Ehenhla ka Vavasati (CEDAW).

src_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Bahwebi ba Dikepeng ya Selemo sa.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi pasise xiringanyeto xo ya ePalamende xa hundzuluxo wa Atikili ya 20(1) ya CEDAW leswaku wu ya pfumeleriwa ximfumo.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Bahwebi ba Dikepeng wa Selemo sa 2022 ho ka sekasekwa.
tgt_text: Mihundzuluxo leyi yi lulamisela nkarhivunavi lowu engeteriweke wa tinhlengeletano ta komiti leti ti phurosesaka swiviko swa matiko lama nga swirho.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena ntlafatsa molao wa dilemong tse 70 tse fetileng wa Bahwebi ba Dikepeng wa 1951, (Molao wa bo 57 wa 1951)..   Ha tshisinyo ena se le molao tla fana ka moralo wa taolo ya kgwebo ya dikepeng tla laola le ho ahwa, ho ngodiswa, ho rehwa mabitso le ho behellwa ha dikepe tse tsofetseng ka thoko..   Diphetoho tsena di tla tlisa diphetoho lekaleng lena la dipalangwang tsa mawatleng le ho netefatsa hore naha ena ipapisa le Ditumellano tsa Matjhaba tsa Dipalangwang tsa Mawatleng..   Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Dipalopalo wa Selemo sa.
tgt_text: Afrika-Dzonga yi sayine ntwanano lowu hi 1993 kutani endzhakukaswona yi wu pfumelela ximfumo hi N'wendzamhala.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Ntlafatso ya Molao wa Dipalopalo wa Selemo sa 2022 ho tla sekasekwa.
tgt_text: Xiringanyeto lexo ya ePalamende xi lava ku fambelanisa ntwanano lowu pfumeleriweke ximfumo nkarhi lowu nga hundza na hundzuluxo wa Atikili ya 20(1) ya ntwanano lowu.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena sisinya diphetoho Molaong wa Dipalopalo wa 1999 (Molao wa bo 6 wa 1999).
tgt_text: Ntwanano wa Misava Hinkwayo hi mayelana na ku Tekeriwa Enhlokweni ka Mithwaso leyi khumbaka Dyondzo ya le Henhla .

src_text: Diphetoho tsena di etswa mabapi le ho ralwa ha mmoho le ho kengwa tshebetsong ha Mokgwa wa Tshebetso wa Naha wa Dipalopalo tshehetsang ho sebediswa ha mokgwa wa dipalopalo bontshang bopaki..   Diphetoho tsena di matlafatsa tshebedisano mmoho ya Lefapha la Dipalopalo le makala mang mmuso ha mmoho le ho atolla tshebetso ya Molao ona   Diketsahalo tse tlang.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi pasise xiringanyeto xo ya Palamende xa Ntwanano wa Misava Hinkwayo hi mayelana na ku Tekeriwa Enhlokweni ka Mithwaso leyi khumbaka Dyondzo ya le Henhla.

src_text: Seboka sa Mopresidente sa Dikgwebo tse Nyane, tse Mahareng le tse Kgolwanyane (SMME) le Mekgatlo ya Matsema.
tgt_text: Xikan'wekan'we loko xi pasisiwile ximfumo xi ta nghenisiwa eka Nhlangano wa Dyondzo, Sayense na Mfumo wa Vun'we bya Tinxaka (UN) kutani laha tikweni xi ta endliwa xi tirha hi ku tirhisa Nawu wa Rimba ra Mithwaso wa Rixaka, 2008 (Nawu wa 67 wa 2008).

src_text: Lefapha la Ntshetsopele ya Dikgwebo tse Nyane ka kopanelo le lekala le ikemetseng ba tla tshwara Seboka sa Naha sa Mopresidente sa di-SMME le Mekgatlo ya Matsema mane Bryanston, Gauteng ho tloha ka la 13 ho ya ka la 15 Pudungwana.
tgt_text: Ntwanano lowa Misava Hinkwayo wu tumbuluxa milawu yo angarhela emisaveni ya ku tekeriwa enhlokweni lokunene, ka nkavuciva na ku va loku nga riki na xihlawuhlawu ka mithwaso na dyondzo ya le henhla na mithwaso.
Wu pfumelela ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka mithwaso ya le matikweni mambe eka matiko lama nga swirho swa UN ya.

src_text: Seboka sena se tla kopanya ditsebi ho tswa ho mmuso le lekaleng le ikemetseng ho tla bontshana ka tsela tsa ntlafatso lekaleng lena.
tgt_text: Ku humesiwa ka mihundzuluxo eka Xiletelo xa Swirho swa Vurhangerinkulu.

src_text: Hara ba lebeletsweng ke mekgatlo ya dikgwebo, ba sebetsang ka di-SMME, barutehi, bangodi ba melawana le ba mekgatlo ya tshehetso ya ditjhelete..   Sebokeng sena ho tla boela ho sekasekwe Moralo wa Kopanelo wa Ntshetsopele ya Dikgwebo tse Nyane oo ka ona ho ikemiseditsweng ho matlafatsa lekala lena la di-SMME.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi seketele xitiviso lexi xi nyikiweke hi Hofisi ya Phuresidente hi Musumbhuluko, 17 Nhlangula 2022 xa ku humesa mihundzuluxo lexi endliweke eka Xiletelo xa Swirho swa Vurhangerinkulu, lexi tlhelaka xi vitaniwa Bukumpfuno ya Vaholobye, ya..   Mihundzuluxo leyi yi endliwile hi Dzivamisoko 2022 yi lulamisela vatirhi vo engetela eka tin'wana ta tihofisi ta Vaholobye lava nga na vutihlamuleri bya kutlula photifoliyo yin'we.

src_text: Seboka sena hape ho lebeletswe hore se thakgole le taba ya Dikgau tsa Selemo le Selemo tsa Mopresidente tsa di-SMME..   Seboka sa Mopresidente sa Twantsho tsa Tlhekefetso ya Basadi le Dipolao tsa Bona (GBVF) sa Selemo sa.
tgt_text: Yi tlhele yi lava Mfumo ku byarha vutihlamuleri hi vutalo bya tihakelo leti fambelanisiwaka na mphakelo wa gezi na mati eka vutshamo bya ximfumo laha ku tshamaka swirho swa vurhangerinkulu..   Khabinete yi tekele enhlokweni swivilelo leswi boxiweke hi vaaki kutani yi teka xiboho xa ku kambisisa Xiletelo xa Swirho swa Vurhangerinkulu.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla tshwara Seboka sa bobedi sa GBVF mane Gallagher Convention Centre, Gauteng ka la 1 le la 2 Pudungwana.
tgt_text: Phurosese leyi yi ta fambisiwa hi xivumbeko lexi nga voyameliki etlhelo naswona xikan'wekan'we loko yi hetiwile, xiletelo lexi xi ta endliwa xi kumeka eka mani na mani hi ku tirhisa webusayiti ya Ndzawulo ya Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo na Mafambiselo: www.dpsa.gov.za.

src_text: Seboka sa pele se ne se tshwarwe ka selemo sa 2018 seo ho sona mmuso le mekgatlo ya setjhaba ba neng ba etse boinehelo ba ho fokotsa ditlhekefetso tsena naheng ena..   Seboka sena sa bobedi ka sona ho tla shejwa tema seng kgathilwe ho kenyeng tshebetsong Moralo wa Naha wa GBVF.
tgt_text: Xinakulobye xa Ncinco xa Eneji Leyinene (JETP) na Kungu ra Vuvekisi ra JETP (JETP-IP).

src_text: Lepetjo la selemong sena le tla re: “Re Tiisa Boikarabelo, ho Patlakiswa le ho Matlafatswa HONA JWALE”..   Seboka sena se tla buisana ka taba tse kenyeletsang boikarabelo mafapheng ikarabellang ha mmoho le bankakarolo ba kang mekgatlo ya setjhaba, lekala le ikemetseng le ya basebetsi..   Imbizo ya Bohlano ya Mopresidente leba Kapa Leboya.
tgt_text: Endzhaku ka ku amukeriwa ka andlalo hi mayelana na JETP na JETP-IP, Khabinete yi seketele JETP-IP naswona yi hundzise ku amukela ka yona ka ntirho lowu koxometiweke lowu endliweke ku yi hluvukisa..   JETP-IP yi katsakanya vuvekisi lebyi lavekaka ku fikelela vutiboheleri bya ku hungutiwa ka khaboni lebyi endliweke hi Mfumo wa Afrika-Dzonga loko ku ri karhi ku kondleteriwa nhluvukiso lowu yisekaka emahlweni, na ku tiyisisa leswaku ku na ncinco lowunene wa vatirhi lava khumbekaka na miganga leyi khumbekaka..     Komiti ya le Xikarhi ka Vaholobye hi mayelana na ku Cinca ka Tlilayimete ku nga ri khale yi ta khoma nhlengeletano ya swihangalasamahungu ku nyika vuxokoxoko byo tala   Milawumbisi.

src_text: Imbizo ya Bohlano ya Mopresidente ya Ntlafatso ya Ditereke (DDM) tlo tshwarelwa Upington, Kapa Leboya ka Labohlano la la 21 Mphalane 2022 lebaleng la dipapadi la Mxolisi Dicky Jacobs..   Imbizo ena ya Mopresidente ya DDM tlo lekola kgatelo pele le diphephetso tse teng phanong ya ditshebeletso Kapa Leboya mme ho be le mekgwa ya tharollo.
tgt_text: Nawumbisi wa Vutleketli bya le Matini bya Xibindzu wa.

src_text: DDM netefatsa ho potlakiswa ha moralo wa phano ya ditshebeletso, ho kengwa ha lona tshebetsong ha mmoho le kabo ya teng ya ditjhelete..   Pele ho imbizo ena, matona, ditho tsa moifo wa bommasepala le boramotse ba tla tshwara mananeo fapafapaneng sebakeng seo sa Upington..   Tlaleho ya Hara Selemo ya Kabo ya Matlotlo (MTBPS).
tgt_text: Khabinete yi pasise xiringanyeto xa Nawumbisi wa Vutleketli bya le Matini bya Xibindzu wa 2022 xo ya ePalamende ku ya phurosesiwa ku ya emahlweni.

src_text: Kabinete kgolwa hore ho fana ka MTBPS ya selemo sa 2022 ke Letona la Matlotlo Enoch Godongwana ka Laboraro la la 26 Mphalane 2022, ke karolo ya mehato ya bohlokwa ya ho beha tsohle pepeneng ha re tla kabong ya matlotlo..   MTBPS fana ka tlaleho ya boinehelo ba mmuso ba ho bontsha ka moo matlotlo naha sebediswang ka teng boetse bontsha le ka moo mmuso tlang ho leka ho fokotsa sekgeo pakeng tsa tjhelete kenang le sebediswang..   Ditlhahlobo tsa Sehlopha sa Leshome.
tgt_text: Nawumbisi lowu wu tlhantlha Nawu wa Vutleketli bya le Matini bya Xibindzu wa 70 wa malembe hi vukhale, 1951 (Nawu wa 57 wa 1951).

src_text: Ditlhahlobo tsa Makgaolakgang tsa Sehlopha sa Leshome tsa selemo sa 2022 di tlo qala ka la 31 Mphalane mme di fele ka la 7 Tshitwe.
tgt_text: Xikan'wekan'we loko wu pasisiwile tanihi nawu, Nawumbisi lowu wu ta nyika rimba ra xinawu ra vutleketli bya le matini ku lawula nkhulukelano wa vukorhokeri na tinhundzu wa swikwekwetsu.

src_text: Kabinete lakaletsa baithuti bana ba Selemo sa 2022 mahlohonolo ditlhahlobong tsa bona.
tgt_text: Exikarhi ka swin'wana, wu ta lawula ku dizayini, ntsariso, na ku thya mavito na ku suriwa ka swikwekwetsu.

src_text: Tshehetso ya matitjhere, batswadi le bahlokomedi tla thusa baithuti bana ho shebana le ditlhahlobo tsa bona ka boitshepo..   Kabinete etsa kgoeletso ho batswadi le bahlokomedi ho kgothatsa le ho thusa bana hore ba kgone ho ithuta hantle malapeng..   Seboka sa Moralo wa Naha wa Ntsetsopele (NDP) le Bokgoni ba Mmuso.
tgt_text: Ku cinca loku ku ta hoxa xandla eka pfuxetiwa ka sekitara ya vutleketli bya le lwandle na ku tlhela yi fambelanisa tiko na Ntwanano wa Nhlangano wa Malwandle wa Matiko ya Misava.

src_text: Lefapha la Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba ka kopanelo le Komeshene ya Naha ya Meralo ka tshebedisano mmoho le lekala la Ntshetsopele Yunivesithing ya Kwa Zulu-Natal di tla tshwara seboka sa NDP le Bokgoni ba Mmuso ho tloha ka la 7 ho ya ho la 9 Pudungwana 2022 lekaleng la Howard College la Yunivesithi ena ya KwaZulu-Natal..   Seboka sena se tla hlahloba bokgoni ba mmuso le tshebetso ya ona dilemong tse leshome tsa pele tsa NDP.
tgt_text: Afrika-Dzonga yi amukerile ximfumo ntwanano lowu.

src_text: Lepetjo la seboka sena ke le reng: “Re Lekola Tshebetso le Bokgoni ba Mmuso Dilemong tse Leshome tsa NDP”.
Ho Nehelanwa ka Lengolo la Bopaki ba Borena ho Morena Misuzulu KaZwelithini.
tgt_text: Nawumbisi wa Hundzuluxo wa Tinhlayonhlayo wa.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla fana ka Lengolo la Bopaki ba Borena ho Morena Misuzulu KaZwelithini mane Lebaleng la Dipapadi la Moses Mabhida, Thekong, ka Moqebelo wa la 29 Mphalane..   Mokete ona latela wa setso bitswang “Ukungena eSibayeni” neng tshwarwe ka la 20 Phato 2022 neng paka ho nka ha hae setulo sa borena ba setjhaba sa Mazulu   MelaetsaDitebohoKabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: Ntate Sam Matekane, ya thonyeditsweng ho ba Tonakgolo ya Mmuso wa Lesotho.
tgt_text: Khabinete yi pasise xiringanyeto xo ya ePalamende xa Nawumbisi wa Hundzuluxo wa Tinhlayonhlayo wa 2022 ku ya phurosesiwa ku ya emahlweni.

src_text: Kabinete boetse ikopanya le Moifo wa Mokgatlo wa Dinaha tsa Afrika neng Behile Dikgetho tsa Palamenteng ya Lesotho ka la 7 Mphalane 2022 leihlo, mme thoholetsa naha eo ka botsitso ba yona ho tsa dipolotiki ka ho tshwara dikgetho tseo ka katleho.
tgt_text: Nawumbisi lowu wu ringanyeta hundzuluxo eka Nawu wa Tinhlayonhlayo, 1999 (Nawu wa 6 wa 1999).

src_text: Afrika Borwa ntse ikemiseditse ho tiisa maqhama yona tshebedisano le dinaha tsa sedika, kontinete ha mmoho le tsa matjhaba..   MatshedisoKabinete fetisetsa matshediso yona ho malapa le metswalle ya: Ntate Fatere Albert Nolan (88), Moprista ya neng inehetse haholo wa Afrika Borwa wa Kereke Katolike ya neng sa tshabe ho hlahisa maikutlo hae ka tsa tumelo nakong ya kgethollo ya mmala.
tgt_text: Mihundzuluxo leyi yi lulamisela nhluvukiso na matirhiselo ya Sisiteme ya tinhlayonhlayo ya Rixaka leyi yi seketelaka swiboho leswi simekiweke eka vumbhoni..   Yi tiyisa nhlanganeriso lowu nga kona exikarhi ka Tinhlayonhlayo ta Afrika-Dzonga na swiyenge swin'wana swa mfumo, na ku ndlandlamukisa rimba ro lawula ra Nawu lowu   Swiendleko leswi Taka.

src_text: Ka selemo sa 2003, Mopresidente wa ka nako eo Thabo Mbeki ne mo tlotle ka Kgau ya Silivera ya Order of Luthuli ka kabelo ya hae ntweng ya demokrasi ya naha ena le ho lwanela toka le ditokelo tsa botho nakong ya kgethollo ya mmala”   Kgiro.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Mabindzu Lamatsongo, Lamatsongotsongo na ya le Xikarhi (SMME) na Mabindzunhlanganelo ya Phuresidente.

src_text: Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang   Moatevokate James Mlawu – Molaodi Kakaretso, Lefapheng la Dipalangwang   Ntate Shabeer Khan – Motsamaise Moholo wa Ditjhelete: Lefapheng la Matlotlo.
tgt_text: Ndzawulo ya Nhluvukiso wa Mabindzu Lamatsongo, hi ku tirhisana na vakhomaxiave va sekitara leyi nga riki ya mfumo, yi ta rhurhela Samiti ya SMME na Mabindzunhlanganelo ya Phuresidente eBryanston, Gauteng kusuka 13 kufika 15 Hukuri..   Samiti leyi yi tisa endhawini yin'we vatlanginkulu va sekitara leyi nga riki ya mfumo na ya mfumo eka ikhosisiteme ya mabindzu lamatsongo, ku burisana hi mayelana na ku kuma tindlela ta ku tirhisana eka ku tiyisa sekitara leyi.

src_text: Kabinete dumellana le ho hirwa ha batho ba latelang:.
tgt_text: Vatekaxiave lava languteriwaka va katsa tichembara ta mabindzu, vatirhi va SMME, swidyondzeki, vaendlatipholisi na mihlangano ya timali ya nhluvukiso.

src_text: Ditho tsa Boto ya Afrika Borwa ya tsa Bohahlaudi   Ngaka Nondumiso Maphazi (Modula Setulo)   Ngaka Aubrey Mhlongo (Motlatsi wa Modula Setulo)   Mme Pretty Ntombela   Mme Nomahlubi Mazwai   Ntate Odwa Mtati   Ntate Ravi Nadasen kgethilwe hape)   Ntate Enver Duminy kgethilwe hape)   Mme Nandipha Mzileni Mbulawa   Ntate Mduduzi Zakwe kgethilwe hape)   Mme Rosemary Anderson   Mme Lehlohonolo Rapodile; lel.
tgt_text: Samiti leyi yi ta tlhela yi kanela Kungukulu ra Nhluvukiso wa mabindzu Lamatsongo leri Pfanganisiweke ra Rixaka, leri ri nyikaka rimba ra xiqhinga ku tiyisa sekitara ya SMME.

src_text: Mme Nonkqubela Silulwane (Moemedi wa Lefapha).
tgt_text: Samiti leyi yi tlhela yi languteriwa ku tivisa Masagwati ya SMME ya Phuresidente ya Rixaka ya Lembe na Lembe.

src_text: Ditho tsa Boto ya Koporasi ya Taolo ya Mebila   Ngaka Eddie Mogalefi Thebe kgethilwe hape)   Mme Thandi Clara Thankge kgethilwe hape)   Moprofesara Maredi Mphahlele   Mme Nomusa Mufamadi (Modulasetulo)   Moatevokate Xola Stemela   Mme Lerato Magalo   Moprofesara Chitja Twala   Ntate Nkumeleni John Kudzingana   Mme Jaxa (Setho sa keketso); le   Mme HM Mbanyele-Ntshinga (Setho sa keketso).
tgt_text: Ku Rhurheriwa ka Samiti ya Madzolonga yo ya hi Rimbewu na ku Dlayeteriwa ka Vaxisati (GBVF) ya.

src_text: Ntate Tshepo Monaheng – Motsamaisi ya ka Sehloohong (CEO): Khamphane ya Naha ya Meru (Tumellano ya kgiro ekeditswe ka dilemo tse tharo.
tgt_text: Phuresidente Ramaphosa ta rhurhela Samiti ya GBVF ya Phuresidente ya vumbirhi eGallagher Convention Centre eGauteng hi masiku ya 1 na 2 Hukuri.

src_text: Ntate Reginald Lavhelesani Demana – CEO: Mokgatlo wa Naha wa Afrika Borwa wa Taolo ya Mebila..   Mme Ditebogo Kgomo – CEO: Taolo ya Naha ya Nuclear.
tgt_text: Samiti leyo sungula leyi khomiweke hi 2018 yi tirhisiwile ku bohelela nakambe mfumo na vatirhisani lava nga na ku tsakela kun'we va vaaki eka ku herisa timhangu ta le henhla ta madzolonga ehenhla ha vavasati erixakeni..   Samiti leya vumbirhi yi ta tirhisiwa ku kambisisa ndzima leyi khatsiweke eka ku tirhisiwa ka Kungu ra Xiqhinga ra Rixaka hi mayelana na GBVF.

src_text: Ntate Risenga Maluleka – Radipalopalo Moholo (Tumellano ya kgiro ekeditswe).
tgt_text: Yi ta rhurheriwa ehansi ka nkongomelo: “Vutihlamuleri, Hatlisiso na Ntwariso SWESWI”..   Samiti leyi yi ta burisana, exikarhi ka swin'wana, hi mayelana na ku kuma tindlela ta ku hatlisisa magoza na vutihlamuleri kusuka eka tindzawulokulu na vakhomaxiave hinkwavo lava va katsaka vaaki lava nga na ku tsakela kun'we, sekitara leyi nga riki ya mfumo na vatirhi..   Xivijo xa Phuresidente xa Vuntlhanu xi ya eKapa-N'walungu.

src_text: Mme Kedibone Olga Madiehe – CEO: Mokgatlo wa Taolo ya Penshene ya Basebeletsi ba Mmuso.
tgt_text: Xivijo xa Phuresidente xa Modlolo wa Nhluvukiso wa Swifundzatsongo (DDM) xa Vuntlhanu eUpington, Kapa-N'walungu xi ta endleka hi Ravuntlhanu, 21 Hukuri 2022 eMxolisi Dicky Jacobs Stadium..   Xivijo xa Phuresidente xa DDM xi ta hlahluva ndzima leyi khatsiweke na mitlhontlho ya mphakelo wa vukorhokeri eKapa-N’walungu na ku phalala ku yi ololoxa.

src_text: Issues in the environment.
tgt_text: Issues in the environment.

src_text: Presidential Summit on Gender-Based Violence and Femicide (GBVF).
tgt_text: Presidential Summit on Gender-Based Violence and Femicide (GBVF).

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the hosting of the second Presidential Summit on GBVF at the Gallagher Estate in Midrand, Gauteng on 1 and 2 November 2022 under the theme: “Accountability, Acceleration and Amplification, NOW!”.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the hosting of the second Presidential Summit on GBVF at the Gallagher Estate in Midrand, Gauteng on 1 and 2 November 2022 under the theme: “Accountability, Acceleration and Amplification, NOW!”.

src_text: The summit reflected on progress made in the implementation of declarations proposed during the 2018 Presidential Summit, which reaffirmed the country’s commitment to united, comprehensive and effective response to GBVF..
tgt_text: The summit reflected on progress made in the implementation of declarations proposed during the 2018 Presidential Summit, which reaffirmed the country’s commitment to united, comprehensive and effective response to GBVF..

src_text: Participants at the two-day summit accounted for work being done towards the implementation of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) on GBVF, which aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and country as whole..
tgt_text: Participants at the two-day summit accounted for work being done towards the implementation of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) on GBVF, which aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and country as whole..

src_text: The summit was the ideal platform to engage in honest and robust discussions around successes and challenges in the fight against GBVF.
tgt_text: The summit was the ideal platform to engage in honest and robust discussions around successes and challenges in the fight against GBVF.

src_text: It also showcased the need for collective action and how significant success can be achieved if adequate resources are provided and managed correctly.
tgt_text: It also showcased the need for collective action and how significant success can be achieved if adequate resources are provided and managed correctly.

src_text: The agreements reached at the summit have demonstrated the importance of the partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF..
tgt_text: The agreements reached at the summit have demonstrated the importance of the partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF..

src_text: Some of the interventions agreed upon included the need to allocate adequate funding to the NSP on GBVF, to implement consequence management mechanisms to ensure accountability, and to strengthen national, provincial and local accountability structures..
tgt_text: Some of the interventions agreed upon included the need to allocate adequate funding to the NSP on GBVF, to implement consequence management mechanisms to ensure accountability, and to strengthen national, provincial and local accountability structures..

src_text: Cabinet reiterated that all acts of violence and abuse will not be tolerated in our society.
tgt_text: Cabinet reiterated that all acts of violence and abuse will not be tolerated in our society.

src_text: Communities are urged to tackle the scourge of GBVF head-on by reporting perpetrators to law-enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: Communities are urged to tackle the scourge of GBVF head-on by reporting perpetrators to law-enforcement agencies.

src_text: Each sector of our society must play its part by creating conditions that make it difficult, if not impossible, for GBVF to thrive.
tgt_text: Each sector of our society must play its part by creating conditions that make it difficult, if not impossible, for GBVF to thrive.

src_text: Safety and security .
tgt_text: Safety and security .

src_text: Cabinet has reassured the public that the National Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (NATJOINTS) – which comprises various government departments led by the State Security Agency, South African Police Service and South African National Defence Force – has an intelligence-driven capacity to deal with threats to our national security, including terrorism.
tgt_text: Cabinet has reassured the public that the National Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (NATJOINTS) – which comprises various government departments led by the State Security Agency, South African Police Service and South African National Defence Force – has an intelligence-driven capacity to deal with threats to our national security, including terrorism.

src_text: Through NATJOINTS, the security of the country is assessed regularly for any possible security threat.
tgt_text: Through NATJOINTS, the security of the country is assessed regularly for any possible security threat.

src_text: As part of the cooperation agreements with other intelligence agencies from other countries, South Africa also benefits from the exchange of relevant intelligence information that can ensure the safety of the nation..
tgt_text: As part of the cooperation agreements with other intelligence agencies from other countries, South Africa also benefits from the exchange of relevant intelligence information that can ensure the safety of the nation..

src_text: Cabinet calls on the public to remain vigilant and to report any suspicious and illegal activities to law enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: Cabinet calls on the public to remain vigilant and to report any suspicious and illegal activities to law enforcement agencies.

src_text: Do not keep quiet; if you see something, say something – together we can keep the nation safe.
tgt_text: Do not keep quiet; if you see something, say something – together we can keep the nation safe.

src_text: 2022 Medium-Term Budget Policy Statement (MTBPS).
tgt_text: 2022 Medium-Term Budget Policy Statement (MTBPS).

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the bold measures introduced in the 2022 MTBPS to restore the health of our public finances, just as the world economy is taking dangerous turn for the worse..
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the bold measures introduced in the 2022 MTBPS to restore the health of our public finances, just as the world economy is taking dangerous turn for the worse..

src_text: The steps announced by Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana in Parliament, Cape Town on Wednesday, 26 October 2022, included narrowing our budget deficit greatly to improve our fiscal framework, support our economic standing and give South Africans every confidence in the future prospects of our economy.
tgt_text: The steps announced by Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana in Parliament, Cape Town on Wednesday, 26 October 2022, included narrowing our budget deficit greatly to improve our fiscal framework, support our economic standing and give South Africans every confidence in the future prospects of our economy.

src_text: The planned increase in contingency reserves allows us to deal with emergencies such as natural disasters.
tgt_text: The planned increase in contingency reserves allows us to deal with emergencies such as natural disasters.

src_text: The 2022 MTBPS further boosts our key priorities of infrastructure and service-delivery programmes, and provides additional relief to support the poor and vulnerable in our nation..
tgt_text: The 2022 MTBPS further boosts our key priorities of infrastructure and service-delivery programmes, and provides additional relief to support the poor and vulnerable in our nation..

src_text: Cabinet calls on all socio-economic sectors to partner with the government to uplift our economy to improve the lives of our citizens across the country.
tgt_text: Cabinet calls on all socio-economic sectors to partner with the government to uplift our economy to improve the lives of our citizens across the country.

src_text: South Africa – Spain relations.
tgt_text: South Africa – Spain relations.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcome of the Official Visit to South Africa by Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez Pérez-Castejón of Spain to solidify the already strong relations between the two countries.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcome of the Official Visit to South Africa by Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez Pérez-Castejón of Spain to solidify the already strong relations between the two countries.

src_text: The Prime Minister was accompanied by the Spanish Minister for Industry, Trade and Tourism, Ms Reyes Maroto, and business delegation.
tgt_text: The Prime Minister was accompanied by the Spanish Minister for Industry, Trade and Tourism, Ms Reyes Maroto, and business delegation.

src_text: The visit created opportunities for various South African sectors to meet with their Spanish counterparts and to deepen cooperation in trade and investment, science and innovation, arts and culture, sports and education.
tgt_text: The visit created opportunities for various South African sectors to meet with their Spanish counterparts and to deepen cooperation in trade and investment, science and innovation, arts and culture, sports and education.

src_text: This visit provided another boost to the country’s investment and economic growth drive.
tgt_text: This visit provided another boost to the country’s investment and economic growth drive.

src_text: Ethiopia – Tigray Peace Talks.
tgt_text: Ethiopia – Tigray Peace Talks.

src_text: South Africa, under the auspices of the African Union, hosted formal peace talks between the warring sides in the conflict in Ethiopia's Tigray region, from 25 to 30 October.
tgt_text: South Africa, under the auspices of the African Union, hosted formal peace talks between the warring sides in the conflict in Ethiopia's Tigray region, from 25 to 30 October.

src_text: The dialogue was facilitated by Nigeria’s former President Olusegun Obasanjo, Kenya's former President Uhuru Kenyatta and South Africa's former Deputy President Phumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka.
tgt_text: The dialogue was facilitated by Nigeria’s former President Olusegun Obasanjo, Kenya's former President Uhuru Kenyatta and South Africa's former Deputy President Phumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka.

src_text: Cabinet expressed its support for peaceful and sustainable solution to the conflict, in line with South Africa’s foreign policy objectives of secure and conflict-free continent   Cabinet Decisions.
tgt_text: Cabinet expressed its support for peaceful and sustainable solution to the conflict, in line with South Africa’s foreign policy objectives of secure and conflict-free continent   Cabinet Decisions.

src_text: National Integrated Small Enterprise Development (NISED) Strategic Framework.
tgt_text: National Integrated Small Enterprise Development (NISED) Strategic Framework.

src_text: Cabinet approved the NISED Strategic Framework for implementation.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the NISED Strategic Framework for implementation.

src_text: The initial Integrated Strategy for the Promotion of Entrepreneurship and Small Enterprises (ISPESE) was adopted in.
tgt_text: The initial Integrated Strategy for the Promotion of Entrepreneurship and Small Enterprises (ISPESE) was adopted in.

src_text: The ISPESE and the subsequent NISED give effect to the 1995 White Paper on the National Strategy for the Development and Promotion of Small Business in South Africa.
tgt_text: The ISPESE and the subsequent NISED give effect to the 1995 White Paper on the National Strategy for the Development and Promotion of Small Business in South Africa.

src_text: The NISED Strategic Framework provides an integrated strategy to strengthen and support entrepreneurship for small and medium-sized enterprises.
tgt_text: The NISED Strategic Framework provides an integrated strategy to strengthen and support entrepreneurship for small and medium-sized enterprises.

src_text: It provides structured coordination framework for all key ecosystem role players in small to medium enterprise development.
tgt_text: It provides structured coordination framework for all key ecosystem role players in small to medium enterprise development.

src_text: In April this year, Cabinet approved the publication of the draft NISED strategic framework for public comment.
tgt_text: In April this year, Cabinet approved the publication of the draft NISED strategic framework for public comment.

src_text: Through the wide consultations, the strategy was enhanced by inputs from the public and from the National Economic Development and Labour Council, which is forum comprising business, civil society, labour, academics and government that seeks to deal with economic, labour and development issues and related challenges facing the country.
tgt_text: Through the wide consultations, the strategy was enhanced by inputs from the public and from the National Economic Development and Labour Council, which is forum comprising business, civil society, labour, academics and government that seeks to deal with economic, labour and development issues and related challenges facing the country.

src_text: Draft Policy on Social Development Services to Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: Draft Policy on Social Development Services to Persons with Disabilities.

src_text: Cabinet approved the publishing for public comment of the draft Policy on Social Development Services to Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the publishing for public comment of the draft Policy on Social Development Services to Persons with Disabilities.

src_text: The policy gives effect to the White Paper on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities and the United Nations (UN) Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (UNCPRD).
tgt_text: The policy gives effect to the White Paper on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities and the United Nations (UN) Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (UNCPRD).

src_text: The policy guides the Department of Social Development in the provision of its services to persons with disabilities and their respective families.
tgt_text: The policy guides the Department of Social Development in the provision of its services to persons with disabilities and their respective families.

src_text: It outlines the restrictive environment and barriers that continue to marginalise and exclude persons with disabilities from mainstream society, and from participating in social and economic activities.
tgt_text: It outlines the restrictive environment and barriers that continue to marginalise and exclude persons with disabilities from mainstream society, and from participating in social and economic activities.

src_text: It proposes monitoring mechanisms that will ensure closer tracking of its implementation and mainstream interventions within the relevant departments.
tgt_text: It proposes monitoring mechanisms that will ensure closer tracking of its implementation and mainstream interventions within the relevant departments.

src_text: South Africa is signatory to the UNCPRD and the African Charter on Human and People’s Rights on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities in Africa..   Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Meeting.
tgt_text: South Africa is signatory to the UNCPRD and the African Charter on Human and People’s Rights on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities in Africa..   Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Meeting.

src_text: The IPCC Bureau will be convening its seventh assessment cycle meeting in June.
tgt_text: The IPCC Bureau will be convening its seventh assessment cycle meeting in June.

src_text: The IPCC – which comprises panel of 195-member governments under the UN – is responsible for assessing the available scientific, technical and socio-economic knowledge, so as to advise decision-makers about the causes, impacts and responses to climate change.
tgt_text: The IPCC – which comprises panel of 195-member governments under the UN – is responsible for assessing the available scientific, technical and socio-economic knowledge, so as to advise decision-makers about the causes, impacts and responses to climate change.

src_text: During its meeting in 2023, the IPCC is expected to elect new chairperson for its seventh assessment cycle.
tgt_text: During its meeting in 2023, the IPCC is expected to elect new chairperson for its seventh assessment cycle.

src_text: Cabinet has endorsed the nomination of Prof Debra Roberts from the University of KwaZulu-Natal for this position.
tgt_text: Cabinet has endorsed the nomination of Prof Debra Roberts from the University of KwaZulu-Natal for this position.

src_text: Prof Roberts has championed increased IPCC outreach work in Africa.
tgt_text: Prof Roberts has championed increased IPCC outreach work in Africa.

src_text: She is currently member of the IPCC Bureau.
tgt_text: She is currently member of the IPCC Bureau.

src_text: If elected she would be the first woman and person from Africa to chair this body.
tgt_text: If elected she would be the first woman and person from Africa to chair this body.

src_text: Her election will send positive message on the good work being done by female scientists from Africa  Upcoming events.
tgt_text: Her election will send positive message on the good work being done by female scientists from Africa  Upcoming events.

src_text: 2022 16 Days of Activism Campaign.
tgt_text: 2022 16 Days of Activism Campaign.

src_text: South Africa will join the world in participating in the annual 16 Days of Activism against GBV, which kicks off on 25 November, the International Day for the Elimination of Violence against Women, and runs until 10 December, Human Rights Day.
tgt_text: South Africa will join the world in participating in the annual 16 Days of Activism against GBV, which kicks off on 25 November, the International Day for the Elimination of Violence against Women, and runs until 10 December, Human Rights Day.

src_text: Cabinet approved this year’s concept and the theme as “Socio-Economic Rights and Empowerment to build women’s resilience against Gender-based violence and Femicide: Connect, Collaborate, Contract”.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved this year’s concept and the theme as “Socio-Economic Rights and Empowerment to build women’s resilience against Gender-based violence and Femicide: Connect, Collaborate, Contract”.

src_text: During the 16 Days of Activism for No Violence against Women and Children this year, South Africa will focus its awareness activities on the implementation of the NSP on GBVF.
tgt_text: During the 16 Days of Activism for No Violence against Women and Children this year, South Africa will focus its awareness activities on the implementation of the NSP on GBVF.

src_text: The plan aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and the country as whole.
tgt_text: The plan aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and the country as whole.

src_text: Disability Rights Awareness Month (DRAM) and National Day of Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: Disability Rights Awareness Month (DRAM) and National Day of Persons with Disabilities.

src_text: Cabinet approved the concept and the theme for the 2022 DRAM and National Day of Persons with Disabilities, which runs from 3 November to 3 December.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the concept and the theme for the 2022 DRAM and National Day of Persons with Disabilities, which runs from 3 November to 3 December.

src_text: The theme is: “Empowering Persons with Disabilities through resourceful, sustainable and safe environments”..
tgt_text: The theme is: “Empowering Persons with Disabilities through resourceful, sustainable and safe environments”..

src_text: The theme emphasises the importance of resolving existing barriers affecting people with disabilities.
tgt_text: The theme emphasises the importance of resolving existing barriers affecting people with disabilities.

src_text: This includes ensuring resourceful, sustainable and safe environments for persons with disabilities, and also recognising that not all disabilities are visible.
tgt_text: This includes ensuring resourceful, sustainable and safe environments for persons with disabilities, and also recognising that not all disabilities are visible.
